item.title: The Dawn of the Digital Won: What a KRW Stablecoin Means for Investors
item.description: The launch of a Korean Won stablecoin: Will it be the next STO craze or a new investment frontier? Kurumi bets on the explosive growth of issuer stocks and mainnet tokens, while Mikael warns of priced-in hype and the limits of a domestic-only market. We analyze the opportunities and pitfalls of owning a piece of future financial infrastructure.
